page.title: 08DANESHOLME CLUB
page.content: Joe,the school caretaker helps run the {Danesholme Club.}He says that the club is for the{community.}The club has been open for two years.If you want to go to the club you have to have a membership card(it only serves its members). At weekends it organises special tris for the family.There are also special events during the year for children. The club has two pool tables,one juke box,two one-arm bandits and a space invader. On Friday,Saturday and Sunday there are live entertainments. There has never been any trouble at the club. It is good to have a club on the estate where people can meet.
